revision.text:
==Spreading Pokérus== Spreading Pokérus can only occur in the [[Pokémon Day Care]]. Currently, only a Pokémon that fulfill the below conditions are capable of spreading the virus:
'''''Spreader Requirements''''' #infected with Pokérus, state is ''Contagious'' or ''Cured'' (see [[Pokérus#Pokérus States|Pokérus States]]) #Not ready to hatch #Being bred manually (ie: a hatchery helper is not assisting with its egg)
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
